law.catch_line: Civil penalties for violation of chapter.
law.text: Any personal representative or other person who violates any of the provisions of this chapter shall be subject to the uniform civil penalties imposed pursuant to KRS 131.180.
law.history: Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 65, sec. 19, effective July 15, 1994. â€“ Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 403, sec. 17, effective July 14, 1992.
